description: FDA-regulated medical device software - Cleanroom for high-reliability patient safety
systemDescription: Embedded software for automatic insulin delivery pump (closed-loop system). Monitors continuous glucose monitor (CGM) readings, calculates insulin dosage using control algorithm, and controls pump motor. Includes safety limits (max bolus, basal rate limits, low glucose suspend), battery monitoring, alarm system, and wireless connectivity for healthcare provider monitoring. Must comply with FDA 21 CFR Part 820 and IEC 62304 Class C (death or serious injury possible).
notes: FDA requires formal risk analysis and mitigation
IEC 62304 Class C requires formal verification activities
Dosage algorithm must be mathematically proven correct
Safety limits must be verified to never be violated
Usage profile based on typical patient daily routines
MTTF target reflects balance between reliability and regulatory practicality
Statistical testing demonstrates safety in realistic usage scenarios
